0: Three masked men wearing helmets break into a jewelry store. They smash the glass display case with a sledgehammer and steal jewelry. One of the thieves is caught by a member of the public.
16: Three masked men wearing helmets and black clothing break into a jewelry store. They smash the glass display case with a sledgehammer, causing the glass to shatter.
